body_html: I noticed there is a profiler and advisor tool in tf official code, and it supports distributed runtime check like Checks RecvTensor RPC latency and bandwidth., when will this check be available in open source tf?
body_text: I noticed there is a profiler and advisor tool in tf official code, and it supports distributed runtime check like Checks RecvTensor RPC latency and bandwidth., when will this check be available in open source tf?
body: I noticed there is a [profiler and advisor tool](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/core/profiler) in tf official code, and it supports `distributed runtime check` like `Checks RecvTensor RPC latency and bandwidth.`, when will this check be available in open source tf?
